summary: The diff shows updates to the fallback room (floor/ceiling overlays, wall textures, wall decor) and project metadata, but the provided truncated code does not include concrete evidence of an espresso/coffee machine prop being added on top of the counter or positioned/aligned per the counter (z = -5) requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a visible 3D coffee/espresso machine prop on top of the counter in the always-rendered fallback scene (shiny silver/chrome, casts/receives shadows).
missing_requirements.reason: In the shown portion of the modified fallback scene, there is no mesh/group that clearly represents a coffee/espresso machine placed on the counter, nor any visible material settings demonstrating a chrome look (high metalness/low roughness) for such a prop. The comment mentions an espresso machine, but the truncated code excerpt does not show its implementation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Place the coffee machine aligned with the counter placement (z aligned with counter group at z = -5), not overlapping existing fallback countertop props, and visible from the default camera start.
missing_requirements.reason: No explicit position/transform for a coffee/espresso machine is visible in the provided diff excerpt, so alignment to the counter (z = -5), non-overlap with other countertop props, and visibility from the default camera cannot be verified from the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed ceiling rendering in the fallback scene, including a ceiling plane and a contour overlay pass.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to add a coffee machine prop on the counter in the fallback scene; it does not request ceiling geometry or contour overlay rendering changes.
